name: Liyue: The Harbor of Stone and Contracts

achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Liyue
achievements.desc: Light up the map in the following zones: Bishui Plain, Qiongji Estuary, Minlin, Lisha, Sea of Clouds.

achievements.name: Surveyor of Stone
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).

achievements.name: Unmovable Mountain
achievements.desc: Upgrade the Statues of The Seven in Liyue to their maximum level.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Liyue
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in Liyue.

achievements.name: Lithic Guide
achievements.desc: Follow 20 Seelie in Liyue to their Seelie Courts (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).

achievements.name: Lithic Guide
achievements.desc: Follow 40 Seelie in Liyue to their Seelie Courts (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).

achievements.name: Lithic Guide
achievements.desc: Follow 60 Seelie in Liyue to their Seelie Courts (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).

achievements.name: Rock-Steady Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 200 chests in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).

achievements.name: Rock-Steady Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 400 chests in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).

achievements.name: Rock-Steady Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 800 chests in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).

achievements.name: Rock-Steady Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 10 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).

achievements.name: Rock-Steady Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 20 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).

achievements.name: Rock-Steady Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 40 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
